languages.text: {n}Наконец, завершив свои ритуалы, ваш спутник вытягивает из складок красного одеяния кабель и подключает его к одному из разъемов. По шнуру пробегает разряд — и техножрец вздрагивает, а в воздухе начинает плыть запах паленой проводки. Тем не менее, когитатор послушно выключается, стирая жуткую сущность с экрана и освобождая разъем с инфокриптой.{/n}

{n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the data-crypt from its port.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Наконец, завершив свои ритуалы, ваш спутник вытягивает из складок красного одеяния кабель и подключает его к одному из разъемов. По шнуру пробегает разряд — и техножрец вздрагивает, а в воздухе начинает плыть запах паленой проводки. Тем не менее, когитатор послушно выключается, стирая жуткую сущность с экрана и освобождая разъем с инфокриптой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion pulls out a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges over the cable making the Tech-Priest flinch and the smell of burnt wiring fills the air, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and freeing the cybercrypt connector.{/n}

{n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion pulls out a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges over the cable making the Tech-Priest flinch and the smell of burnt wiring fills the air, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and freeing the cybercrypt connector.{/n}

{n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the cybercrypt from its port.{/n}

{n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the cybercrypt from its port.{/n}

{n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the data-crypt from its port.{/n}

languages.text: {n}仪式完成之后，技术神甫从他红色法衣的褶皱中抽出一根电缆，将其插入沉思者的插座中。一股电流沿着电缆涌了进来，技术神甫向后退了一步，空气中顿时充满了电缆被烧焦的味道。不过，沉思者顺从地关机了。屏幕上邪恶的内容消失了，数据密存器也从端口中掉了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the data-crypt from its port.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}仪式完成之后，技术祭司从他红色法衣的褶皱中抽出一根电缆，将其插入思考器的插座中。一股电流沿着电缆涌了进来，技术祭司向后退了一步，空气中顿时充满了电缆被烧焦的味道。不过，思考器顺从地关机了。屏幕上邪恶的内容消失了，数据密存器也从端口中掉了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por fin, al terminar los rituales, tu acompañante saca un cable de los pliegues de sus rojas vestiduras y lo conecta a uno de los puertos. Una descarga recorre el cable, haciendo que el tecnosacerdote se estremezca y llenando el aire de olor a cable quemado, pero el cogitador obedece y se apaga, borrando al siniestro ser de la pantalla y liberando la cripta de datos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the data-crypt from its port.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por fin, al terminar los rituales, tu acompañante saca un cable de los pliegues de sus rojas vestiduras y lo conecta a uno de los puertos. Una descarga recorre el cable, haciendo que el tecnosacerdote se estremezca y llenando el aire de olor a cable quemado, pero el cogitador obedece y se apaga, borrando al siniestro ser de la pantalla y liberando la cripta de datos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ようやく儀式が完了する。パスカルは赤い祭服の重なったところからコードを抜き、ソケットのひとつに差し込んだ。ケーブルから激しく放電したことで技術司祭が身を引くと、ワイヤーから出る焼けた臭いが空気に充満する。しかし考算機は言う事を聞いてシャットダウンし、邪悪なソレを画面から消し去り、データ・クリプトをポートから解放した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the data-crypt from its port.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ようやく儀式が完了する。パスカルは赤い祭服の重なったところからコードを抜き、ソケットのひとつに差し込んだ。ケーブルから激しく放電したことで技術司祭が身を引くと、ワイヤーから出る焼けた臭いが空気に充満する。しかし考算機は言う事を聞いてシャットダウンし、邪悪なソレを画面から消し去り、データ・クリプトをポートから解放した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Schließlich, als die Rituale abgeschlossen sind, zieht dein Gefährte ein Kabel aus den Falten seines roten Gewands und steckt es in einen der Anschlüsse. Eine Entladung rast durch das Kabel, der Techpriester zuckt zurück, und die Luft riecht nach verbranntem Draht, aber der Cogitator schaltet sich gehorsam ab, löscht die unheimliche Wesenheit vom Bildschirm und gibt die Daten-Krypta aus seinem Port frei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the data-crypt from its port.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Schließlich, als die Rituale abgeschlossen sind, zieht dein Gefährte ein Kabel aus den Falten seines roten Gewands und steckt es in einen der Anschlüsse. Eine Entladung rast durch das Kabel, der Techpriester zuckt zurück, und die Luft riecht nach verbranntem Draht, aber der Cogitator schaltet sich gehorsam ab, löscht die unheimliche Wesenheit vom Bildschirm und gibt die Daten-Krypta aus seinem Port frei.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsque les rituels sont enfin terminés, votre compagnon tire un câble de sa robe rouge et l'insère dans l'une des prises. Vous voyez une décharge courir le long du câble et remonter jusqu'au technoprêtre qui tressaille, mais malgré l'odeur de fils brûlés qui emplit l'air, le cogitateur s'éteint. L'entité sinistre disparaît de l'écran et la crypte de données est libérée de sa fente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the data-crypt from its port.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque les rituels sont enfin terminés, votre compagnon tire un câble de sa robe rouge et l'insère dans l'une des prises. Vous voyez une décharge courir le long du câble et remonter jusqu'au technoprêtre qui tressaille, mais malgré l'odeur de fils brûlés qui emplit l'air, le cogitateur s'éteint. L'entité sinistre disparaît de l'écran et la crypte de données est libérée de sa fente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yoldaşın, ayin tamamlandıktan sonra kızıl cübbesinden bir kablo çıkararak yuvalardan birine bağlıyor. Salınım, kablodan geçerek yoldaşına ulaştığında Tekno Rahip seğiriyor. Havayı yanık kablo kokusu dolduruyor. Bu sırada kavramsayar, boyun eğerek kapanıyor. Habis varlık sonunda ekrandan siliniyor ve veri mahzeni serbest kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At last, when the rituals are complete, your companion withdraws a cord from the folds of his red vestment and plugs it into one of the sockets. A discharge surges along the cable, making the Tech-Priest flinch and filling the air with the smell of burnt wiring, but the cogitator obediently shuts down, erasing the sinister entity from the screen and releasing the data-crypt from its port.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yoldaşın, ayin tamamlandıktan sonra kızıl cübbesinden bir kablo çıkararak yuvalardan birine bağlıyor. Salınım, kablodan geçerek yoldaşına ulaştığında Tekno Rahip seğiriyor. Havayı yanık kablo kokusu doldurduktan sonra kavramsayar boyun eğerek kapanıyor. Habis varlık sonunda ekrandan siliniyor ve veri mahzeni serbest kalıyor.{/n}
